Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/util/Resources/root
Synopsis Retrieve a full hierarchical representation of all resources in the Eclipse workspace.
Function Resource root()
Examples 
rascal>import util::Resources;
ok
rascal>root();
Resource: root({
    project(
      |project://slps|,
      {
        file(|project://slps/README.txt|),
        folder(
          |project://slps/.settings|,
          {file(|project://slps/.settings/org.eclipse.core.resources.prefs|)}),
        folder(
          |project://slps/src|,
          {
            folder(
              |project://slps/src/syntax|,
              {
                file(|project://slps/src/syntax/XBGF.rsc|),
                file(|project://slps/src/syntax/?BGF.rsc|),
                file(|project://slps/src/syntax/BGF.rsc|),
                file(|project://slps/src/syntax/CBGF.rsc|)
              }),
            folder(
              |project://slps/src/converge|,
              {file(|project://slps/src/converge/Guided.rsc|)}),
            folder(
              |project://slps/src/transform|,
              {
                file(|project://slps/src/transform/CBGF.rsc|),
                file(|project://slps/src/transform/NegotiatedXBGF.rsc|),
                folder(
                  |project://slps/src/transform/library|,
                  {
                    file(|project://slps/src/transform/library/Massage.rsc|),
                    file(|project://slps/src/transform/library/Yacc.rsc|),

                    file(|project://slps/src/transform/library/Util.rsc|),
                    file(|project://slps/src/transform/library/Test.rsc|),

                    file(|project://slps/src/transform/library/Core.rsc|)
                  }),
                file(|project://slps/src/transform/XBGF.rsc|)
              }),
            folder(
              |project://slps/src/normal|,
              {
                file(|project://slps/src/normal/ANF.rsc|),
                file(|project://slps/src/normal/BGF.rsc|)
              }),
            folder(
              |project://slps/src/bgf|,
